column1: For a second I was almost jealous of the clouds.
The sun always shines above the clouds.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Behind every cloud is another cloud.
Clouds suit my mood just fine.
If you use your imagination, you can see lots of things in the cloud formations.
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
There's a bright spot in every dark cloud.
There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
We all have bad days, but one thing is true; no cloud is so dark that the sun can't shine through.
You must not blame me if I do talk to the clouds.
When we feel stuck, look at the sky. The clouds remind us that everything changes.
Life is good at the beach
Let the countdown to the Beach begin
Life is better at the Beach
Beach days always
Love you to the beach and back.
The best days are Beach days.
Beach More Worry Less
Beach life is sheared perfect.
Beach therapy should be covered by health insurance
The mountains are calling and I must go
It isn’t the mountain ahead that wears you out; it’s the grain of sand in your shoe
Mountains teach that not everything in this world can be rationally explained
Every man should pull a boat over a mountain once in his life
I have loved her, my little wanderer, with a mind full of wild forests and eyes that await adventures
In the mountains there are only two grades: You can either do it, or you can’t.
The mountain remains unmoved at seeming defeat by the mist
It’s not the Mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
I’ve realised that at the top of the mountain, there’s another mountain
For me, a holiday is about taking a book and going to a mountain and reading.
I can’t understand why men make all this fuss about Everest — it’s only a mountain
A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad
The dog is the perfect portrait subject. He doesn't pose. He isn't aware of the camera
No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you
The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total. You must not betray it.
Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
You can tell by the kindness of a dog how a human should be.
Dog is God spelled backward
Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
Water is Your Best Friend for Life
Thousands Have Lived Without Love, Not One Without Water
Water is Your Best Friend for Life
Time spent with cats is never wasted
I've always been mad about cats.
I love my cats more than I love most people. Probably more than is healthy.
Cats are inquisitive, but hate to admit it.
I love cats.
I take care of my flowers and my cats. And enjoy food. And that's living.
If kisses were snowflakes, I'd send you a blizzard.
Be like snow: beautiful but cold.
If you listen carefully, the silence of snow falling is beautiful.
I love you snow much.
Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow
When it snows, you have two choices: shovel or make snow angels
Winter is coming
Discover the beauty of winter
Hello Winter
Walking in a winter wonderland.
Bikes bring you places cars never see.
Life is better on a bike.
Bike to work, bike to play, bike tomorrow, bike today
Life is like riding a bike. To keep your balance, you must keep moving
When the flowers start blooming, I like to ride my bike
I won't quit skating until I am physically unable.
I love skating and sparkling and flying around the ice, and people clap for you. It's an amazing feeling.
I love skating. It's part of my life, and I never wanted to give it up.
Beautiful things don’t ask for attention
The earth has music for those who listen
Nature is not a place to visit it is home
Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset
You are not in the mountains. The mountains are in you.
Nature never goes out of style
Choose only one master – NATURE
Nature itself is the best physician
If sky is the limit, then go there
Say yes to new adventures
Let’s sleep under the STARS
Don’t go through life, grow through life
On the top of mountains & beneath the stars
The only thing I like better than talking about Food is eating
Food is really and truly the most effective medicine.
I get way too much happiness from good food.
If you combine good flavors, food turns into an orchestra
Cheese – milk’s leap towards immortality.
Count the memories not the calories.
Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
There is no sincere love than the love of food.
Romaine calm and go plant a garden!
The best things in life are green
hey say gardens are dishes best served green.
I can totally see why they say it's best to go with the flowers

Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design.
Buildings, too, are children of Earth and Sun.
Recycling old buildings to show art is very important
You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
Go for great. Own your game. Be kind. Get big things done.
To me, cricket is a simple game. Keep it simple and just go out and play.
Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
Nobody cares if you can’t dance well. Just get up and dance
When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It’s to enjoy each step along the way
Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion
To be fond of dancing was a certain step towards falling in love.
here are shortcuts to happiness, and dancing is one of them.
Dancing faces you towards Heaven, whichever direction you turn
You can dance anywhere, even if only in your heart.
Singing is one of the most organic forms of humanity
If I cannot fly, Let me sing.
God respects me when I work, but he loves me when I sing.

Whatever comes in my way, I take it with smile

I truly believe my job is to make sure people smile
